attributes.action: Hold parliamentary vote on uniting parties to tackle BREXIT withdrawal together!
attributes.background: All parties must collaborate on our BREXIT deal without personal political gain.The opposition can't amend the withdrawal agreement in 4 years, this is permanent. We must have as many opinions as possible working on the Withdrawal Agreement to represent all voices.Focus on best deal only...together.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government of Parliament to do.

There's already a petition about a government of national unity, which you might like to sign. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246772
